title: (x) "C" with construction lines - Rubino Sans {Colin}
content:
can any1 id this face?   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000339im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/15728.gif)   
   
pls help!
author: crozynski

comments.content: It's on the tip of my tongue, too. We had this one before, and I can't remember for the life of me which it is, though I'm pretty sure someone ID'd it, and I recall being surprised that it wasn't a free font. Dang, isn't Yves at work yet?

"dang, isn't Yves at work yet?" -   
   
who is working in Belgium - when you have diamonds?   
   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000339im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
been on the same situation 2 months ago.... ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000339im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)

ah. maybe bad joke.   
   
Belgium - great comics & diamonds ( Antwerpen - Israel - Bangkok : the business road)   
   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000339im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
